name: Conveyor Belt Madness
description:
Controls:

  • Mouse + WASD to place conveyor belts

You have to create the desired times an ship them to the correct exit. Raw material is provided on the left side. If moved through the correct assembly the material is converted. The press will turn raw material into balls. The painters will change the colors.

You will earn 100 Points for each correctly delivered product, but lose 50 for every wrong product.

Source Code can be found here: https://github.com/H4kor/conveyor-belt-madness
